sentences.sContent: Raise you hands if you like junk food.
sentences.sContent_eng: Raise you hands if you like junk food.
sentences.sCn: 提高你的手如果你喜欢垃圾食品。

sentences.sContent: We have an immunity to all of the junk that lies at the edges of our culture.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have an immunity to all of the junk that lies at the edges of our culture.
sentences.sCn: 这是一个道理。 我们已经对于我们社会文化中的各种垃圾产生了免 疫力。
